title: Bernoulli’s Equation
body: Hoover Dam on the Colorado River is the highest dam in the United States at $$221$$ $$m$$, with an output of $$1300$$ MW. the dam generates electricity with water taken from a depth of $$150$$ $$m$$ and an average flow rate of $$650$$ $$\frac{m^3}{s}$$.
lesson: 12 Fluid Dynamics and Its Biological and Medical Applications
